Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 33rd overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2016...
Traded from Cincinnati to St. Louis (C) on 4/16/2017 (Going to STL: P Robert Wilcoxson, CF Jesse Honeycutt. Going to CIN: RF Patricio Garza, P Jame Meany)...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Philadelphia on 3/2/2019 (Going to STL: 2B Arthur Pickett. Going to PHI: LF Jesse Honeycutt)...
Had first career hit on 7/7/2019, off Philip Lund (MON)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/5/2020, off Ricky Benson (SF)...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/2021, hitting .565 with 0 HR, 9 RBI...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,221,429 through salary arbitration...
Won Gold Glove at Leftfield in 2023...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,764,286 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2024 Allstar game...
1/31/2025: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,764,286 through salary arbitration...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Brooklyn on 7/12/2025...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/2025, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/2/2026 to a 5-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Injured on 6/13/2026 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
